Package de.wota.gamemaster

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLogger
    Class for all loggers.
    AILoader
    Handles dynamic loading of player AIs.
    AIPolicy
    Controls the permitted actions of a dynamically loaded AI.
    Simulation
    Contains the main loop that calls tick() and updates both the view and the statistics.
    SimulationInstance
    Contains all the information needed for one round of simulation.
    TestLogger  
    Wota
    Class used to start the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractLogger.LogEventType  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AIInformation
    Annotation used by all player-implemented AIs.
